title: cultural_data_Toile_de_Jouy_Museum
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=fr.smartapps.JOUY_fr.
Application Name: Toile de Jouy Museum.
Number of Reviews: 7.00.
Application Description: Toiles de Jouy: Oberkampf’s Virtual FactoryThis app will enable you to discover Christophe Philippe Oberkampf’s life and work, the creator of the “Toiles de Jouy”. From 1760 to 1815, the Jouy-en-Josas factory has printed around 30000 different patterns. Those cloths remain today as a source of inspiration for many contemporary designers in France and abroad. The ‘Amis de la Toile de Jouy’ association imagined this app which presents:-An interactive tour in current Jouy-en-Josas with 360° reconstitutions of what was the factory in the XVIII century-The steps to create and print the Toiles de Jouy-Oberkampf’s biography including written and audio contents-More than 200 pictures of Toiles de Jouy you can find at the Museum along with references and explanations-Useful information to prepare your visit at the Toile de Jouy Museum in Jouy-en-Josas.Read moreCollapse.
